description: Hiking Core Cap is a classic hiking boot with clean lines and a classic design. Made from premium Italian materials, with details of the highest quality and craftmanship rooted back several generations, this product is both long-lasting and durable. The toe cap and mudguard running on top of the sole, makes the boot more resilient against all types of weather, and will keep your feet dry longer.
name: Mono Hiking Core Cap, Cow Nylon, Leather Lining - Mens
